short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the sources and hints of a Family Tree person or record persona

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When on a "person page" in FamilySearch Family Tree, clicking on the tree icon will open a new tab showing all the sources attached to the person in a grid view.
